title: Luxury house for sale in Nugegoda
details:
* Luxury house for sale near Jayawardanapura Universityin Wijerama., 4 large bed rooms with attached bathrooms and A/C, 39 perches land extent, Good size swimming pool, Domestic and Drivers quarters, 5000 square feet, Laundry room and store room, Separate large office room and Garage space for 2 vehicles and can park 6 vehicles in the premises, 3 phase electricity and solar hot water.

* Price- 66 million, selling for highest offer.

* Inspection only through Appointment! Brokers will not be entertained!
